text: Marcello José das Neves Alves Caetano (; 17 August 1906 – 26 October 1980) was a Portuguese politician. He had many important positions in the government. In 1968 he became prime minister. In 1974 the military took leadership of Portugal in the Carnation Revolution. Caetano was removed from his position. ==References== Category:1906 births Category:1980 deaths Category:Portuguese lawyers Category:Politicians from Lisbon Category:Prime ministers of Portugal Category:Portuguese Roman Catholics Category:Leaders ousted by a coup Category:Former dictators
title: Marcelo Caetano
